SELECT u.UNIT_SEQ, u.UNIT_TITLE, u.UNIT_CAPTAIN_USER_SEQ, u.UNIT_CODE FROM unit u JOIN department d ON u.UNIT_CODE = d.department_unit_seq WHERE d.department_code = #{departmentCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unit (UNIT_SEQ, UNIT_TITLE, UNIT_CAPTAIN_USER_SEQ, UNIT_CODE) VALUES (unit_seq.NEXTVAL, #{unit_title}, #{unit_captain_user_seq}, #{unit_code})
